\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	X \&\& {V_X} \&\& {U_X} \\
	X \&\& {V_X'} \&\& {U_X'} \\
	X \&\& {V_X} \&\& {U_X}
	\arrow["{l_C}", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\exists _! \varphi}", from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{l_C'}", from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{\exists _! \psi }", from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{l_C}", from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=3-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
